posts.post_title: FS: 19 Tobacco card screw down cases (SOLD)
posts.post_content:
I won a bunch of cards that came in these screwdowns. I only use albums, so I have no use for them. All of them show some wear/scratches, but all are in tact and look okay.

(SOLD)

Thanks
I will take them PM sent  Eddie
